results.title: Abridge - Crunchbase Company Profile & Funding
results.content: Abridge is an AI-driven platform that transforms patient-clinician conversations into structured clinical notes for healthcare industries.

results.title: Abridge - Pentagram
results.content: When Abridge founder Shiv Rao approached Pentagram, his company—founded in 2019— already gained traction with doctors and hospital administrators; in 2023, leading healthcare software company Epic chose Abridge as its first-ever partner in generative AI, integrating the technology directly into their medical records system. Abridge’s bold, unconventional identity system has supported Abridge's remarkable growth across major health systems—from Kaiser Permanente's network of 40 hospitals and 600 medical offices, to Yale New Haven Health System and Emory Healthcare. With Abridge's new identity, we found a way to start with a strong foundation—a bridge between doctors' and patients' needs—and design a system that conveys precision and care. Like Abridge's AI technology itself, the identity system transforms complexity into clarity, creating something that is both technically sophisticated and fundamentally human.

results.title: Abridge | LinkedIn
results.content:
Overview:
Abridge was founded in 2018 with the mission of powering deeper understanding in healthcare. Our Best in KLAS AI-powered platform was purpose-built for medical conversations, improving clinical documentation efficiencies while enabling clinicians to focus on what matters most—their patients. Our enterprise-grade technology transforms patient-clinician conversations into structured clinical notes in real-time, with deep EMR integrations. Powered by Linked Evidence and our purpose-built, auditable AI, we are the only company that maps AI-generated summaries to ground truth, helping providers quickly trust and verify the output. As pioneers in generative AI for healthcare, we are setting the industry standards for the responsible deployment of AI across health systems.

Website: https://www.abridge.com/
Crunchbase Url: https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/abridge-d1a4?utm_source=linkedin&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=linkedin_companies&utm_content=profile_cta_anon&trk=funding_crunchbase
Linkedin Url: https://www.linkedin.com/company/abridgehq

Industry:

results.title: Abridge: AI-Powered Clinical Documentation Vendor Snapshot
results.content: 4. **abridge ai powered clinical documentation vendor snapshot** Insights Briefing | AI-Catalyst ### Abridge: AI-Powered Clinical Documentation Vendor Snapshot AI-powered physician documentation tools are one of the most promising applications for artificial intelligence - particularly generative AI - in healthcare. Explore the vendor space and learn about Abridge's physician documentation tool as part of our broader Vendor Snapshots series. Each snapshot includes an overview of a vendor's tool, as well as health system executive feedback on the vendor from our "Candid Conversations" webinar series. #### Abridge – AI Powered Clinical Documentation Tool Overview * Founded in 2018 by practicing cardiologist Dr. Shiv Rao, Abridge’s mission is to reduce documentation burden on clinicians through generative AI solutions.​ ##### Abridge Contact:

results.title: Excited to share the brand identity we created for Abridge ...
results.content: Image 20: @njenworks and team have designed the new identity for @macrofactorapp, the science-based health and fitness app. Project team: @njenworks @whitneybadge @xkang_kevin @just1nzhang @drithii Jin Chun @jennifer.bahng @harrycadams Collaborators: Kyle Barron-Cohen, strategy @__eva__green__, strategy @edgarferrer, motion design @reset.type.studio, typeface development @jaisonlin, merch photography Image 21: Continuing their ongoing collaboration with @storefrontnyc, @njenworks and team have designed a visual identity and custom typeface for the Storefront for Art and Architecture’s annual gala. Image 22: @njenworks and team have designed the new identity for @generalcatalyst, the venture capital brand that is redefining what venture capital can be. @njenworks and team designed a brand identity and promotional campaign for the free public event, drawing inspiration from vernacular graphics found in Asian culture.

raw_content:
Abridge - Crunchbase Company Profile & Funding
Abridge is an AI-driven platform that transforms patient-clinician conversations into structured clinical notes for healthcare industries.

Abridge - Pentagram
When Abridge founder Shiv Rao approached Pentagram, his company—founded in 2019— already gained traction with doctors and hospital administrators; in 2023, leading healthcare software company Epic chose Abridge as its first-ever partner in generative AI, integrating the technology directly into their medical records system. Abridge’s bold, unconventional identity system has supported Abridge's remarkable growth across major health systems—from Kaiser Permanente's network of 40 hospitals and 600 medical offices, to Yale New Haven Health System and Emory Healthcare. With Abridge's new identity, we found a way to start with a strong foundation—a bridge between doctors' and patients' needs—and design a system that conveys precision and care. Like Abridge's AI technology itself, the identity system transforms complexity into clarity, creating something that is both technically sophisticated and fundamentally human.

Abridge | LinkedIn
Overview:
Abridge was founded in 2018 with the mission of powering deeper understanding in healthcare. Our Best in KLAS AI-powered platform was purpose-built for medical conversations, improving clinical documentation efficiencies while enabling clinicians to focus on what matters most—their patients. Our enterprise-grade technology transforms patient-clinician conversations into structured clinical notes in real-time, with deep EMR integrations. Powered by Linked Evidence and our purpose-built, auditable AI, we are the only company that maps AI-generated summaries to ground truth, helping providers quickly trust and verify the output. As pioneers in generative AI for healthcare, we are setting the industry standards for the responsible deployment of AI across health systems.
